original_text: The Lord openeth the eyes of the blind: the Lord raiseth them that are bowed down: the Lord loveth the righteous:
korean_text: 여호와께서 맹인들의 눈을 여시며 여호와께서 비굴한 자들을 일으키시며 여호와께서 의인들을 사랑하시며

sentences.original_text: The Lord openeth the eyes of the blind
the Lord raiseth them that are bowed down
